item.title: Ken Loach’s Screenwriter Arrested at Edinburgh Pro-Palestine Protest
item.description: Paul Laverty, who wrote the award-winning screenplays for ‘I, Daniel Blake,’ ‘Sweet Sixteen’ and ‘The Wind That Shakes the Barley,’ was charged over wearing a t-shirt supporting a banned organization.
